articles.description: The 24-year-old makeup mogul shared behind the scenes images while getting ready for the splashy event, which required eight people to get right with one lady on her hands and knees.
articles.content:
Kylie Jenner wore a wedding dress from Off-White when she hit the Met Gala in New York City on Monday.
Soon after the 24-year-old makeup mogul shared behind the scenes images to Instagram while gett… [+13055 chars]

articles.title: Vogue editor Anna Wintour's BRUTAL rules for the magazine's Met Gala staff revealed in new book - Daily Mail
articles.description: A new biography of Anna Wintour dishes on behind the scenes of the Met Gala, and how the famously frosty editor once left the party in 'mascara-laced tears'
articles.content: Anna Wintour has long earned the sobriquet 'The Ice Queen' not only for her haughty and imperious air, but for the relentless and sometimes cruel and brutal way in which she conducts her editorial me… [+19988 chars]

articles.title: Kate Middleton stayed up until midnight in royal tradition for Princess Charlotte - Cambridgeshire Live
articles.description: In order to make sure her children's birthdays are as special as possible, Kate Middleton stays up late as part of an adorable tradition
articles.content: She may be royalty and one of the most famous and photographed women on the planet, but to her children, the Duchess of Cambridge is their loving mum, eager to give them the best childhood she can. A… [+2417 chars]
